name: Wood Joinery
description:
A meditation piece about wood joining.

This game was made by  Danda and MNeMoNiCuZ for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme of the jam was "Joined Together".



Controls (Keyboard & Mouse):

  • ESC: Pause Menu
  • RMB: Rotate Camera
  • LMB: Lift and move objects
  • Scroll: Raise and lower objects
  • WASD: Rotate objects

Sounds from:

  • Kenney.nl,  CC0
  • FreeSoundsWorld.com, CC BY-NC 4.0
  • MixKit.co, Mixkit Sound Effects Free License
  • GameDevMarket.net, Pro Licence
  • Soundly, Pro Licence
  • SoundStorm.com, Pro Licence
  • Sound Ideas, Pro Licence

Wood texture from:

  • 4K Materials: Wood Flooring Vol. 02 by Karl Detroit, Unreal Marketplace
